events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on May 1st, with moderate damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim was categorized as an Auto Accident case based on the description containing vehicle collision details.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the customer's case to provide personalized assistance throughout the process.
The customer received an official acknowledgment of the claim, confirming that the case is now being processed.
The claims team requested photographs of the damaged vehicle, a police report, and a copy of the driver’s license.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents including photos of the accident scene and the police report.
The investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident began to verify the claim and assess vehicle damages.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the accident details and verification of the third-party liability.
A settlement offer covering repairs and replacement parts was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and requested prompt processing of the payment.
Following customer approval, the claim was officially approved to proceed with payment issuance for repairs.
The payment for vehicle repairs was successfully issued to the customer’s bank account without delays.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and final customer satisfaction.
All case files and documentation related to this auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference.
